items.sentence: You know that I can't be in Boston next week.
You do know you shouldn't do that, don't you?
You aren't' really going to do that, are you?
You aren't really going to eat that, are you?
You know that I'm not coming back, don't you?
You know that I'd hate to do that, don't you?
I hope to get away from Tokyo for a few days.
I was born in Osaka, but brought up in Tokyo.
Tom said he'd be willing to sing a few songs.
When Tom gives an order, everyone follows it.
Does the fork go on the right or on the left?
Tom might've left his umbrella in Mary's car.
Tom almost lost his life trying to save Mary.
They both drank until they were really drunk.
Tom bought a bag of popcorn and a soft drink.
Tom and Mary drank a bottle of wine together.
The bombing was a suspected terrorist attack.
Tom said that he had a craving for chocolate.
Tom entered the room with his arm in a sling.
The price of food has gone up a lot recently.
I asked Tom to tell me why he didn't do that.
I can definitely do that better than Tom can.
Tom spoke no French the first time I met him.
Tom likes to show everybody how strong he is.
I want to believe that what Tom said is true.
He tried to imagine what the client was like.
I promised Tom that I'd go shopping with him.
I hope we can figure out a way to solve this.
I heard Tom has married a very wealthy woman.
I have the impression that Tom is doing well.
I don't believe that your name is really Tom.
I didn't know that you and Tom were brothers.
Getting Tom to show up on time won't be easy.
Don't you think that Tom should see a doctor?
Don't forget that tomorrow is Tom's birthday.
Do you think we should discuss this with Tom?
Tom and Mary are married and have three kids.
Is there something that you want to tell Tom?
I'm pretty sure that Tom lives in Boston now.
I wish that you wouldn't call me Tom anymore.
I was told I need your permission to do that.
I think that that question isn't appropriate.
I think Tom will eventually learn to do that.
I think Tom is expecting someone to help him.
I swear that I didn't know Tom would do that.
I know that Tom didn't have to do that today.
I know that Tom didn't have to do that alone.
I know that Tom can't help you do that today.
I know that Tom can probably do that for you.
I know that Tom can find the time to do that.
